data.title: Shopping in Copenhagen
data.meta_description: Magasin du Nord is a first choice shopping choice in Copenhagen with a perfect location in the heart of the city. Here you can buy famous luxury brands for women, men and children, interior design, beauty products and delicacies.
data.text:
Magasin du Nord is a first choice shopping choice in Copenhagen with a perfect location in the heart of the city. Here you can buy famous luxury brands for women, men and children, interior design, beauty products and delicacies.

Magasin du Nord has a history back to 1869 and has for more than 120 years had one of the best locations in the King´s New Square in Copenhagen.

The store has five floors and in the basement, you find the popular food market. On the different floors, you can buy beauty luxurious brands, men's wear, sportswear, women´s wear, travel equipment, clothing for children and if you get hungry you can visit the café on the fifth floor.

Buy well-known Danish brands such as Royal Copenhagen, Georg Jensen, Ecco shoes and a lot more famous brands.

Nearby the Magasin du Nord you can visit Strøget - the main walking street in Copenhagen. .

See more: Top brands from Denmark
